message.entry: Must have numeric data in the pie chart.
At least 1 value must be nonnegative.
All data must be finite in pie chart.
Text labels must be a string or a cell array of character vectors.
First argument must be categorical array with at least 1 nonempty category.
Labels must be a string or cell array of character vectors with same number of elements as categories, or be a valid format string.
Labels must have the same number of elements as X or be a valid format string.
X and EXPLODE must be the same length.
Specify exploded slice with category names or logical indices.
Specify exploded slices with a logical or numeric vector.
Explode specified as logical vector must have same number of elements as that of categories.
